cell.paragraph: A selection of wizards have been provided which enable you to quicky and easily start new Eiffel for .NET projects.
Each wizard is composed of a series of `pages' from which you can modify the settings for the new project. Upon completion of the wizard, a new Eiffel System will be created for you.

To access the wizards, select New, Project from the File menu, or right click on a solution in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/20_Solution_Explorer/index.htm Solution Explorer , and select Add, New Project from the context menu. The following dialog will be displayed:

To start a new Eiffel Project, browse to Eiffel Projects in the project types browser, and select the desired wizard. Be sure to select the correct name and location for your new project before you click OK, as this cannot be changed once a wizard is launched.
There are two versions of ENViSioN! available, Enterprise and Free. The Enterprise version contains all wizards, but the Free version only contains a limited set of wizards.
The following wizards are available in both the Free and Enterprise versions:

list.item: Windows Application - A project for creating an application with a Windows user interface using the designer and the .NET Framework libraries
Console Application - A project for creating a command-line application
Class Library - A project for creating classes to use in other applications
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/blank_project.xml Empty Project - An empty project for creating a local application

/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/index.xml Eiffel Graphical Application - A project for creating an application with a user interface using the EiffelBuild wizard

/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/advanced_graphics_project.xml Blank Eiffel Graphical Application - A project for creating an application with a user interface using the Eiffel libraries

/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/windows_only_project.xml Windows Eiffel Application - A project for creating an application with a Windows user interface using the Eiffel libraries

cell.paragraph: The following wizards are only available in the Enterprise version:

list.item: /10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/precompile_wizard.htm Eiffel Class Library - A project for creating classes to use in other Eiffel applications
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/import_eiffelstudio_project.htm Import from EiffelStudio - A project created from an EiffelStudio "ace" file
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project.xml_report_wizard.htm HTML Report - HTML Documentation generated from an existing Eiffel project
